channel.title: Ben Foster on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ben Foster on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto Awards Analysis: Like It Or Not, Sydney Sweeney Has Joined the Best Actress Oscar Race for ‘Christy’
item.description: Sweeney, for her portrayal of trailblazing female boxer Christy Martin, received a prolonged standing ovation following the film’s world premiere on Friday.
